Articles.Content:
It's already fully funded with all stretch goals reached, but I thought you guys might appreciate this. I backed it for an early copy.

[https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/highfrontier/high-frontier-0](https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/highfrontier/high-frontier-0)
There's some really great technology cards in High Frontier that should be in Kerbal. Just saying....
